comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: I believe this is currently spelled Katteri Falls. Googling that name has brought me to some more modern photos of these falls.

comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: Bah. English transliterations are no fun. More spelling variants are popping up. Katterie Water Falls is another name/spelling.

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: There appear to be significant differences in the English spelling of place names in India during the 19th century, as compared to modern spellings. In most cases, we have used the 19th century spellings.
